price: 70. Waa Allaah (Macbuudka Xaqa ah), ma jiro Ilaah (Xaq lagu caabudo) aan Isaga ahayn, Isagaa leh ammaan oo idil iyo mahad tan hore (aduuunka) iyo tan dambe (Aakhirada), Isagaana leh Xukunka, Xaggiisaana idinkoo idil la idiin soo celin.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَلَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa lahu al-ḥamdu fī al-ūlā wal-ākhirati walahu al-ḥuk'mu wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
